item.title: On Education
item.description: Let’s talk about education. There are 2 complementary aspects of getting an education: the scholarly education obtained from rigorously studying academic texts obtained from schooling. the practical education learned from life experiences dealing in the real world. I’m sure that most of us would agree that they fall somewhere on this spectrum of the wise and academic to the streetwise and practical. Too much theory results in losing Skin in The Game while too much of hacking renders the bigger picture of your life a blur.
